title: UFL Championship
overview: The UFL Championship is the annual championship game of the United Football League (UFL), The contest will determine the champion of the UFL season and will be played between the USFL Conference title winners and the XFL Conference title winners. The 2024 Championship Game will be the first UFL Championship Game following the merger of the XFL and the USFL. Before the merger, the USFL had two championship games, in 2022 and 2023, where the Birmingham Stallions defeated the Philadelphia Stars and the Pittsburgh Maulers in back-to-back seasons. The XFL held one championship game in 2023 when the Arlington Renegades defeated the DC Defenders. The two leagues merged before the 2024 season of either league began.
